Package kademlia.operation

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Operation
    An operation in the Kademlia routing protocol
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BucketRefreshOperation
    At each time interval t, nodes need to refresh their K-Buckets This operation takes care of refreshing this node's K-Buckets
    ConnectOperation  
    ContentLookupOperation
    Looks up a specified identifier and returns the value associated with it
    ContentRefreshOperation
    Refresh/Restore the data on this node by sending the data to the K-Closest nodes to the data
    KadRefreshOperation
    An operation that handles refreshing the entire Kademlia Systems including buckets and content
    NodeLookupOperation
    Finds the K closest nodes to a specified identifier The algorithm terminates when it has gotten responses from the K closest nodes it has seen.
    PingOperation  
    StoreOperation
    Operation that stores a DHT Content onto the K closest nodes to the content Key
